mainText:
Reflections on Steve Jobs:

It is difficult to quantify or fully express what Steve Jobs meant to the world.  Certainly you could say he changed the world and how it felt about technology.  But, that doesn't really seem to accurately grasp it.  What Steve Jobs did was more impressive, he anticipated what the world needed before it asked.  Changing the world can be as simple as dictating, while foretelling requires the keen integration of technological advancement and human progression.

Too often the term visionary is applied loosely and inappropriately.  But, Steve Jobs embodied the definition.

Humbly,
author: William
